name: BEDTIME (Daywalkr)
description: BEDTIME is a game created by The_Daywalkr and Wildlingval for the 2020 GMTK GameJam. In it, you have to try to get the high score on your favorite game, past your bedtime, without your dad catching you in the act! Luckily, you have your phone with you to let you know of any intruders - but switching to the phone will take you out of control (hehe) of your game! Be smart!
